title: What are some really sick rap songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Devil's Son - Big L If you mean sick by "twisted or in bad taste" this song was quite shocking when it was released in 1993 and went under the radar of most hip hop fans.The lyrics are unique in that they depict Big L's dreams of being a remorseless sociopath posessed by the devil.  Some of the lyrics are quite graphic and the song is a quintessential contribution to the style of hip hop known as Horrcore.
